subject: Sales
title: Grant Cardone and the 10X Rule
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Grant Cardone and the 10X Rule.

hook.text: Cardone says whatever goal you set, multiply it by ten. Anything less is wasting your time.

buildup.text: His 10X Rule argues that people underestimate effort and overestimate their first plan.

discovery.text: He went from broke and struggling in his twenties to building a billion-dollar real estate empire.

twist.text: Critics call him abrasive. His fans say excess is exactly what average performers need to hear.

climax.text: Love or loathe the style, his message resonates: massive action creates results small steps never will.

punchline.text: He bet on excess. The market proved him right.

quiz.question: What does Grant Cardone's '10X Rule' recommend?
options: Set goals 10 times bigger and take massive action
